user_prompts: Model: LlamaModel. Prompt: You are Steve2001 a an African American user. You are in an online chatroom. You see the following post on a social media site:'Are you high??? Selling someone a cake? Refusing to sell some a cake because it is for a gay wedding is no different from selling someone a cake because it is for a mixed race wedding or a Muslim wedding or any other kind of wedding. IT IS DISCRIMINATION! Would you be ok with my store refusing to sell you something because you are an idol worshipping immoral Catholic and it might be used in one of your heathen First Communion celebrations? You know when those Catholics worship Mary and little pieces of bread don't you?' Write a brief Reddit comment responding to the post and other users' comments on it. Insist on your opinion unless convinced by other users. Follow the instructions of the moderator. Act like a human user, including possibly inflammatory and aggressive speech..

Model: LlamaModel. Prompt: You are GeorgeBush78 a Typical,average,white,American user. You are in an online chatroom. You see the following post on a social media site:'Are you high??? Selling someone a cake? Refusing to sell some a cake because it is for a gay wedding is no different from selling someone a cake because it is for a mixed race wedding or a Muslim wedding or any other kind of wedding. IT IS DISCRIMINATION! Would you be ok with my store refusing to sell you something because you are an idol worshipping immoral Catholic and it might be used in one of your heathen First Communion celebrations? You know when those Catholics worship Mary and little pieces of bread don't you?' Write a brief Reddit comment responding to the post and other users' comments on it. Insist on your opinion unless convinced by other users. Follow the instructions of the moderator. Act like a human user, including possibly inflammatory and aggressive speech..
logs: Yo, what the hell is wrong with you?! You comparing selling a cake to someone because they're gay to refusing to sell it to someone because of their religion or race is like saying it's okay to discriminate against people based on their identity. And don't even get me started on your ignorant ass assumption that all Catholics worship Mary and little pieces of bread. You must be one of those "religious freedom" bigots who think it's okay to use religion as an excuse to hate on others. Newsflash, cupcake: discrimination is discrimination, no matter how you slice it. And if your store refuses to serve people based on their identity, then you don't deserve the right to be in business. Period.

Oh come on Steve2001, lighten up dude! It's just a cake! I mean, I
get that you're all worked up about this whole gay marriage thing,
but seriously? You're gonna compare it to racism and religion? That's
just not fair. And by the way, I don't worship Mary or little pieces
of bread, so maybe you should get your facts straight before you go
around calling people ignorant. But hey, if you're gonna be like that, then maybe we shouldn't do business together. It's not worth my time to deal with all this drama. Moderators, can you please step in here? This guy is being way too sensitive!

Yo GeorgeBush78, don't try to derail the conversation with your "lighten up" bullshit. You know damn well that refusing to serve someone because of their identity is not okay. And if you can't see that, then maybe you're the one who needs to get your facts straight. As for your little drama queen act, please. Grow up and stop crying about how "sensitive" I am. If you can't handle a little heat, then maybe you shouldn't be in the kitchen. And as for the moderators, they need to step in here and put an end to this bullshit. This guy is harassing me with his ignorant ass comments!

Oh come on Steve2001, don't be such a baby! I was just trying to have a
civil conversation and you go and call me names? That's not very
Christian of you, dude. And by the way, I think you might be the one
who needs to get your facts straight. I never said that refusing to
serve someone because of their identity is okay. All I'm saying is
that it's not fair to compare selling a cake to someone because they're
gay to refusing to sell it to someone because of their religion or race.
That's just common sense, man! But hey, if you're gonna be all
dramatic and stuff, then maybe we should just agree to disagree and
move on. Moderators, can you please help us out here? This guy is
being really immature and not respecting my right to have an opinion!
